newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish Finance Minister Kolodko quits, PM says.
newsitem.headline: Polish Finance Minister Kolodko quits, PM says.

text.p: Polish Finance Minister Grzegorz Kolodko has quit and his resignation will be accepted by the president on Tuesday, Prime Minister Wlodzimierz Cimoszewicz said.
Cimoszewicz told public radio Kolodko would be replaced by President Aleksander Kwasniewski's economic adviser Marek Belka.
